                                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> map)
        Method printing out counter page in form of html page.
        Parameters:
        out - PrintWriter from the servlet
        map - Map storing number of CRUD operations in a session. Obtained in servlet.

      • generateResultPage

        public void generateResultPage(java.io.PrintWriter out,
                               java.lang.String resultURL,
                               java.lang.String resultMessage,
                               java.lang.String resultHeader)
        Method for dynamic creationg of result page in form of html page.
        Parameters:
        out - PrintWriter from the servlet
        resultURL - Navigate to this url after 2 seconds
        resultMessage - Display message of the result in a page
        resultHeader - Display header of the result in a page
